alert.note: Alert for Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lee County through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buckingham, or near Fort Myers, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Myers, East Dunbar, Pine Manor, Olga, Palmona Park, Buckingham, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Villas, McGregor, Whiskey Creek, Fort Myers Shores, Page Park, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport, Suncoast Estates, Tice and Gateway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
